pages.text: Speaking of cobblestone generation, if you want $(item)basalt/$ - and you're going to need it for making $(item)deepslate/$ - you can build a very similar setup to make this Nether stone.$(p)When flowing $(item)lava/$ touches $(item)blue ice/$ while a block of $(item)soul soil/$ is waiting underneath, it will create $(item)basalt/$ instead of your usual $(item)cobblestone/$.

pages.title: Basalt Generator
pages.text: See the $(l:tips_and_traps/02_snow_and_ice)previous entry/$ to$(br)find out how to make $(item)ice/$.
